headline: Senior Web Java J2EE Engineer Developer at SFEIR

values.title: Senior Web Java J2EE Engineer Developer

values.summary:
PROJECT
Web application for a SaaS solution about stores management (team: 2 persons)

TASKS
Developing the web application from the persistent layer to the UI layer in the context of an agile process (SCRUM):
° Developing CRUD and complex screens (GWT, RPC, DAO, Objectify)
° Developing the app's navigation with a Google-like menu
° Developing the planning generation engine. 
   ›  Its main objective is to take into account all the parameters (tasks, products, employees, working times...), to combine them in order to generate the planning of the selected day with features such as splitting tasks around each other, sharing them between appropriate employees, ...
° Developing the Google-Calendar-like planning with the following features
   ›  5 minutes time frames
   ›  Drag'n'drop of the tasks inside the planning and from a tasks toolbar
   ›  Resizing tasks like Google-Calendar (but horizontally here)
   ›  Moving automatically adjacent tasks when moving a task
   ›  Google Docs-like auto saving
° Developing a PIN code screen and a tasks dashboard for the employee, to use with a tactile screen, for validating its work progress

TECHNOLOGIES
CSS3, Java 1.6, GWT, GWT-DND, GIN, Guava, Objectify, App Engine

MISCELLANEOUS
GIT, MAVEN, JENKINS
values.title: Senior Web Java J2EE Engineer Developer

values.summary:
PROJECT
Web application for the mass retail sector (team: 4 persons)

TASKS
Developing some of the web application's modules from the persistent layer to the UI layer in the context of an agile process (SCRUM):
° Developing CRUD screens (GWT, RPC, DAO, SQL)
° Developing the templates module for reportings and emails (Velocity)
° Developing the PDF and Excel imports and exports (iText, Apache POI)
° Developing the automatic email's scheduler (Quartz)
° Integrating new concepts and tools: MVP, Places, Gin, Guice, Junit, Mockito, Guava
° Working on code review (Sonar)
° Developing Ibatis mappings and SQL queries
° Specifying and developing with design patterns
° Using Dozer for mapping server-side entities and DTOs
° Writing SVN hooks in Bash for controlling commits

TECHNOLOGIES
GWT, Ajax, CSS, Java 1.6, Gin, Guice, Spring, Ibatis, SQL, Junit, Mockito, POI, QUARTZ, iTEXT, Guava, Bash

MISCELLANEOUS
Tomcat, Microsoft SQL Server, Eclipse, Maven, SVN, Hudson, Trac, Cygwin, Agile development
values.title: Senior Web Java J2EE Engineer Developer

values.summary:
PROJECT
Secutix2, a Ticketing Solution (team: ~ 50 persons)

TASKS
Developing features for the web application's modules from the persistent layer to the UI layer according to specifications:
° Developing CRUD screens for functional entities such as simple tickets, season tickets, ...
° Developing complex rates grids (multi-dimensional, dynamic granularity display, formatting money according to the user's preferences, automatic comparison with other rates grids,  ...)
° Developing a module for comparing and merging contacts
° Developing a module for importing and exporting data with a third-party software
° Developing SQL scripts for the Oracle database 
° Specifying and developing with design patterns:
   ›  Hibernate mappings with annotations on persistent entities
   ›  Using Criteria queries, Hibernate Query Language and SQL in the DAOs to manipulate the persistent entities
   ›  Developing services with transactional annotations
   ›  Customizing spring MVC framework for the application's crud screens
° Developing responsive and elegant UI components with object-oriented Javascript (ExtJS)

TECHNOLOGIES
ExtJS, Ajax, HTML, CSS, DOM, Javascript, JSON, JSP, UEL, Java 1.6, Spring (AOP, MVC, ORM, Transactions), Hibernate (Criteria Queries, HQL, Annotations), PL/SQL

MISCELLANEOUS
Tomcat, Oracle, Eclipse, Maven, SVN, Hudson, Jira, Cygwin
values.title: Senior Web Java J2EE Engineer Developer

values.summary:
PROJECT
ANPE, Agence Nationale Pour l’Emploi, www.anpe.fr (team: ~ 20 persons)

TASKS
Developing new features for the candidates, employers and anpe's advisors web applications, from the persistent layer to the UI layer according to specifications:
° Developing SQL scripts for the Oracle database 
° Specifying and developping according to design patterns:
   ›  entity beans for the persistence layer
   ›  DAOs with Jdbc for handling the entity beans
   ›  services with stateless session beans
   ›  servlets and JSPs for serving dynamic content
° Using Struts to implement a MVC architecture
° Using Javascript to give dynamism to the UI
° Migrating from an Ant build process of one web application to a Maven build process of several web applications

TECHNOLOGIES
Javascript, Struts, J2EE, JSP, Servlet, EJB, JDBC, Java

MISCELLANEOUS
Weblogic, Oracle, Eclipse, Ant, Maven, CVS, Toad, Cygwin
values.title: Junior Web Java J2EE Engineer Developer

values.summary:
° Internship of 4 months for the Master2's course
Working on a new market research on ERPs and Best-of-breeds in the field of Supply Chain Execution in Europe and especially in Germany.
values.title: Market research internship

values.summary:
° Internship for the Engineer's courses
Working on the SVG specifications and modelling an interface between SVG (graphical language) and OWL (ontology language).
values.title: Computer Science internship

specialties: Ajax, J2EE, Java, Javascript, Eclipse, French, English, Spanish, German
summary: A senior Java J2EE web developer with broad experience in web-based development, mainly with AJAX interface and Java-based frameworks such as J2EE, Spring and Hibernate. Resourceful, opened to different technologies, willing to join a state of the art web project to build up a successful career.
